mmse.name: Mini-Mental State Examination
mmse.description: Assessment of cognitive function including orientation, memory, and attention

orientation_time.name: Orientation to Time
orientation_time.instruction: Please answer the following questions about time
questions: What day of the week is it?

orientation_place.name: Orientation to Place
orientation_place.instruction: Please answer the following questions about your location

registration.name: Registration
registration.instruction: I am going to name three objects. Please repeat them back to me.
registration.repeat_instruction: Now repeat the three words back to me:

attention.name: Attention and Calculation
attention.instruction: Please count backwards from 100 by 7s. Stop after 5 numbers.
attention.calculation_prompt: Count backwards from 100 by 7s. Enter each number:

avlt.name: Auditory Verbal Learning Test
avlt.description: Memory test involving learning and recall of word lists

trial_1.name: Trial 1 - First Presentation
trial_1.instruction: I will read a list of 15 words. Listen carefully and then tell me all the words you remember.

digit_span.name: Digit Span Test
digit_span.description: Test of working memory and attention span

forward.name: Digits Forward
forward.instruction: I will say some numbers. Repeat them back in the same order.

backward.name: Digits Backward
backward.instruction: I will say some numbers. Repeat them back in reverse order.

fluency_animals.name: Animal Naming Task
fluency_animals.instruction: Name as many animals as you can think of in 60 seconds. Speak clearly and try to name as many different animals as possible.

description_picture.name: Picture Description
description_picture.instruction: Look at the image and describe everything you see. Talk about what is happening, who is in the picture, and any details you notice.
description_picture.prompt: Describe what you see in the picture...

conversation_daily.name: Daily Routine Description
conversation_daily.instruction: Tell me about your typical day from morning to evening. Describe your routine, activities, and anything else you would like to share.
conversation_daily.prompt: Tell me about your typical day...

speech_tests.record_instruction: Click the microphone to start recording

voice_response_monitoring.name: Voice Response Time Monitoring
voice_response_monitoring.description: Test measuring response time to audio commands
voice_response_monitoring.instruction: Listen carefully to the audio commands and respond as quickly as possible.

audio_pattern_recognition.name: Audio Pattern Recognition
audio_pattern_recognition.description: Identify and respond to different audio patterns
audio_pattern_recognition.instruction: Listen to the audio patterns and identify the sequences.

visual_response_monitoring.name: Visual Response Time Monitoring
visual_response_monitoring.description: Test measuring response time to visual stimuli
visual_response_monitoring.instruction: Watch the screen carefully and respond to visual cues as quickly as possible.

game_engagement.name: Game Engagement Tracking
game_engagement.description: Interactive games to assess cognitive engagement
game_engagement.instruction: Play the interactive games and complete as many as you can.

complex_interaction_monitoring.name: Complex Interaction Monitoring
complex_interaction_monitoring.description: Advanced tasks requiring complex cognitive processing
complex_interaction_monitoring.instruction: Complete the following complex tasks that require attention and problem-solving.
